item.title: CVE-2020-11010|2024-08-04T11:21:14.257Z -- tortoise -- tortoise-orm
item.description: In Tortoise ORM before versions 0.15.23 and 0.16.6, various forms of SQL injection have been found for MySQL and when filtering or doing mass-updates on char/text fields. SQLite & PostgreSQL are only affected when filtering with contains, starts_with, or ends_with filters (and their case-insensitive counterparts).
